changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.delete_auction') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.delete_auction GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.delete_auction @auction_id dbo.id_t, @zone_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Auction_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE auction_id = @auction_id AND zone_id = @zone_id DELETE FROM dbo.Auction_Inventories WHERE auction_id = @auction_id AND zone_id = @zone_id DELETE FROM dbo.Auctions WHERE id = @auction_id AND zone_id = @zone_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.delete_auction') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.delete_auction GO
